attributes.action: Annull EU referendum result: criminal misconduct by ‘Leave’ makes it invalid.
attributes.additional_details:
Finance violations & voter coercion: see recent court cases against ‘Leave’ leaders.

Support from Russia: see HMG reports into role of Russia : Cambridge Analytica in using fake news to support ‘Leave’.
attributes.background:
The EU withdrawal referendum result is fatally tainted by the criminal misconduct of the ‘Leave’ campaign, including:
1) campaign finance violations
2) voter coercion
3) open support from the Russian state

It follows that the referendum result cannot be trusted, and so should be annulled.
